Text:
JW - Just a suggestion/idea: Barring good reasons to the contrary it might be a good idea to delete old/obsolete torrents to reduce overhead on the site's servers.  It would seem a 30-90 day retention cycle would be sufficient.

P.S.  Much gratitude to you for uploading these podcasts.
